title: Alkylation of α-pinene with isobutene/isobutane over Hβ zeolite
content:

α-Pinene and isobutene/isobutane can undergo hybrid alkylation under acid catalysis, resulting in C14 and C20 product fractions with favorable bio-based high-energy-density fuel properties after hydrogenation. In this study, the catalytic...
